content:
The Eyes Unit 120 ORP provides a unique video of the destruction of the occupiers using FPV-pings and other means, as well as objective confirmation of successful combat work.

About thisreportedAnd the relevant video was published by the commander of the Land Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine Lieutenant General Alexander Pavlyuk.

As it is noted, effective work on the personnel of Russian troops and hostile equipment is ongoing.

"The units of the Land Forces and other components of defense forces continue to destroy the enemy in the eastern direction," the commander stressed.

As reported by the Armyinform, in the AFU daydestroyed more than 900 Russian occupiers, 27 BBM and 23 Artsystem.
title: The Commander of the Armed Forces of the Armed Forces showed how "eyes" destroy the occupiers
description: This was reported and published by the appropriate video commander of the Armed Forces Land Forces ...
author: Army Inform
